member.name: DRAWPATRECT
member.summary: The DRAWPATRECT structure defines a rectangle to be created.

member.name: DRAWPATRECT.ptPosition
member.summary: The upper-left corner of the rectangle, in logical units.

member.name: DRAWPATRECT.ptSize
member.summary: The lower-right corner of the rectangle, in logical units.

summary.para: The style of the rectangle. It can be one of the following.

member.name: DRAWPATRECT.wPattern
member.summary: Amount of grayness of the rectangle, as a percentage (0-100). A value of 0 means a white rectangle and 100 means a black rectangle. This is only used when wStyle is 2.
